Title: In Silico Sorghum GxExM Dataset For Prediction Algorithm Comparisons
Abstract: A simulated Multi-Environment Trial (MET) dataset to stimulate the development and comparisons of predictive algorithms to deconvolute genotype-by-environment-by-management interactions in plant breeding. Contains Genomic (SNP & QTL) & Phenotypic Data for Multiple Traits
Tags: genotype-by-environment-by-management interactions; Plant breeding; data collection; Prediction algorithms; Genomic Prediction
